attributes.action: David cameron to be sacked for gross misconduct! & serve life along side Alexander Blackman if he is not immediately released!
attributes.additional_details: I think it's a disgrace that Alexander Blackman has been sentenced to life for doing his job! If the boot was on the other foot they would not of cared for him! They would of beheaded him and made a public display! David Cameron should also face charges for sending our troops their and telling them to fight! That is mass murder on a major scale! He should also be sacked for gross misconduct! When public services are being stretched to the max and budgets are being cut! But yet we still provide foreign aid! We all suffer pay freezes when they demand above inflation pay rises! No longer should we be silent! Stand up & be heard!
